subject: Re: [junit] Bug reports?
msgSnippet: Bruce, This is generally a good place to start, in case someone knows a fix or workaround.  The official bug list is at
messageBody:
Bruce,

This is generally a good place to start, in case someone knows a fix
or workaround. The official bug list is at
http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues.

That said, I just got this message and your previous message nearly
simultaneously, so I think it was moderation lag (a human has to
approve first-time posts, to keep down spam.)

David Saff

On Wed, Dec 2, 2009 at 10:35 AM, Bruce <bcowan12@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Where should I submit a bug report for JUnit?  I wrote one up for this group a couple of days ago, but it never appeared.  Other messages have been posted since, so I'm assuming that I've posted it in the wrong spot.
>
> Thanks,
>  Bruce
